content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">  <ShortName>scienceunderthes</ShortName>  <Description>Search Science Under The Stars - An evening outdoor lecture series open to all!</Description>  <Contact>support@wordpress.com</Contact>  <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://scienceunderthestars.org/?s={searchTerms}&feed=atom"/>  <Url type="application/rss+xml"  template="http://scienceunderthestars.org/?s={searchTerms}&feed=rss2"/>  <Url type="text/html"            template="http://scienceunderthestars.org/?s={searchTerms}" method="GET" />  <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml" rel="self" template="/osd.xml" />  <LongName>Science Under The Stars</LongName>  <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/vnd.microsoft.icon">http://0.gravatar.com/blavatar/24a28d3b38953de22cc7ca0e01fad334?s=16&d=http%3A%2F%2Fscienceunderthestars.org%2Ffavicon.ico</Image>  <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/jpeg">http://0.gravatar.com/blavatar/e529bd310c8d2a19595b1d9217c0ba9b?s=64&d=http%3A%2F%2Fs0.wp.com%2Fi%2Flogo%2Fgray-white-transparent-64.png</Image>  <Query role="example" searchTerms="photography" />  <Tags>evolution-2 central-texas biodiversity-2 texas south-america butterflies-2 insects-2 battle-of-the-sexes ants behavior-2</Tags>  <Developer>Automattic</Developer>  <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>  <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>  <Language>en</Language>  <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <moz:SearchForm>http://scienceunderthestars.org</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
